sections.heading: art, defined.Body art means body piercing, branding, permanent color technology, and tattooing

sections.text:
38-1008.Body art, defined.

Body art means body piercing, branding, permanent color technology, and tattooing.

SourceLaws 2004, LB 906, § 7;R.S.Supp.,2006, § 71-346.01;Laws 2007, LB463, § 270.
